sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { withRouter, useHistory, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { Dashboard, Expense, People, Places, Product, Time, Users1, settings, Purchase, Quotation, Return, Transfer, Sales1, } from "../../EntryFile/imagePath"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Scrollbars } from "react-custom-scrollbars"; import FeatherIcon from "feather-icons-react"; const Sidebar = (props) => { const [isSideMenu, setSideMenu] = useState(""); const [path, setPath] = useState(""); const history = useHistory(); const toggleSidebar = (value) => { setSideMenu(value); }; const expandMenu = () => { document.body.classList.remove("expand-menu"); }; const expandMenuOpen = () => { document.body.classList.add("expand-menu"); }; const pageRefresh = (url, page) => { history.push(`/settings/${url}/${page}`); window.location.reload(); }; const location = useLocation(); let pathname = location.pathname; useEffect(() => { document.querySelector(".main-wrapper").classList.remove("slide-nav"); document.querySelector(".sidebar-overlay").classList.remove("opened"); document.querySelector(".sidebar-overlay").onclick = function () { this.classList.remove("opened"); document.querySelector(".main-wrapper").classList.remove("slide-nav"); }; }, [pathname]); return (
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "" ? "" : "")} > Dashboard
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "product" ? "" : "product") } > Product {isSideMenu == "product" ? (
    • Product List
    • Add Product
    • Category List
    • Add Category{" "}
    • Sub Category List
    • Add Sub Category{" "}
    • Brand list{" "}
    • Add Brand
    • Import Product
    • Print Barcode
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "sales" ? "" : "sales") } > Sales {isSideMenu == "sales" ? (
    • Sales List
    • POS
    • New Sales
    • Sales Return List
    • New Sales Return
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "purchase" ? "" : "purchase") } > {" "} Purchase{" "} {isSideMenu == "purchase" ? (
    • Purchase List
    • Add Purchase
    • Import Purchase
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "expense" ? "" : "expense") } > {" "} Expense{" "} {isSideMenu == "expense" ? (
    • Expense List
    • Add Expense
    • Expense Category
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar( isSideMenu == "quotation" ? "" : "quotation" ) } > {" "} Quotation{" "} {isSideMenu == "quotation" ? (
    • Quotation List
    • Add Quotation
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "transfer" ? "" : "transfer") } > {" "} Transfer{" "} {isSideMenu == "transfer" ? (
    • Transfer List
    • Add Transfer
    • Import Transfer
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "return" ? "" : "return") } > {" "} Return{" "} {isSideMenu == "return" ? (
    • Sales Return List
    • Add Sales Return
    • Purchase Return List
    • Add Purchase Return
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "people" ? "" : "people") } > {" "} People{" "} {isSideMenu == "people" ? (
    • Customer List
    • Add Customer
    • Supplier List
    • Add Supplier
    • User List
    • Add User
    • Store List
    • Add Store
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "places" ? "" : "places") } > {" "} Places{" "} {isSideMenu == "places" ? (
    • New Country
    • Country List
    • New State
    • State List
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "" ? "" : "")} > {" "} Components
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "" ? "" : "")} > {" "} Blank Page
  • toggleSidebar( isSideMenu == "error pages" ? "" : "error pages" ) } > {" "} Error Pages {isSideMenu == "error pages" ? (
    • 404 Error
    • 500 Error
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "elements" ? "" : "elements") } > Elements {isSideMenu == "elements" ? (
    • Sweet Alerts
    • Tooltip
    • Popover
    • Ribbon
    • Clipboard
    • Drag & Drop
    • pageRefresh("elements", "rangeslider") } > Range Slider
    • Rating
    • Toastr
    • Text Editor
    • Counter
    • Scrollbar
    • Spinner
    • Notification
    • Lightbox
    • Sticky Note
    • Timeline
    • pageRefresh("elements", "form-wizard") } > Form Wizard
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "Charts" ? "" : "Charts") } > Charts {isSideMenu == "Charts" ? (
    • Apex Charts
    • pageRefresh("charts", "chart-js")} > Chart Js
    • Morris Charts
    • pageRefresh("charts", "chart-flot")} > Flot Charts
    • pageRefresh("charts", "chart-peity")} > Peity Charts
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "Icons" ? "" : "Icons") } > Icons {isSideMenu == "Icons" ? (
    • Fontawesome Icons
    • Feather Icons
    • Ionic Icons
    • Material Icons
    • Pe7 Icons
    • Simpleline Icons
    • Themify Icons
    • Weather Icons
    • Typicon Icons
    • Flag Icons
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "Forms" ? "" : "Forms") } > Forms {isSideMenu == "Forms" ? (
    • Basic Inputs{" "}
    • Input Groups{" "}
    • Horizontal Form{" "}
    • {" "} Vertical Form{" "}
    • Form Mask{" "}
    • Form Validation{" "}
    • Form Select2{" "}
    • File Upload{" "}
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "Table" ? "" : "Table") } > Table {isSideMenu == "Table" ? (
    • Basic Tables{" "}
    • Data Table{" "}
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar( isSideMenu == "Application" ? "" : "Application" ) } > Application {isSideMenu == "Application" ? (
    • Chat
    • Calendar
    • Email
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "Report" ? "" : "Report") } > Report {isSideMenu == "Report" ? (
    • Purchase order report
    • Inventory Report
    • Sales Report
    • Invoice Report
    • Purchase Report
    • Supplier Report
    • Customer Report
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "Users" ? "" : "Users") } > Users {isSideMenu == "Users" ? (
    • New User{" "}
    • Users List
    ) : ( "" )}
  • toggleSidebar(isSideMenu == "Settings" ? "" : "Settings") } > Settings {isSideMenu == "Settings" ? (
    • General Settings
    • Email Settings
    • Payment Settings
    • Currency Settings
    • Group Permissions
    • Tax Rates
    ) : ( "" )}
); }; export default withRouter(Sidebar);
